concept.title: Student Privacy Settings
concept.shortdesc: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act(FERPA)https://www.ed.gov/policy/gen/guid/fpco/ferpa/index.html, you have the right to restrict all or part of your directory information.

section.p: FERPA includes your preferred email, your enrollment status (full-time/part-time), major field of study, and more.
